title: Fix live pricing with Kolkata INR rates and 5-minute auto-refresh

requirements.text: Configure backend to fetch live gold and silver prices specifically for Kolkata location in Indian Rupees (INR)

quotes: Pricing should be in indian rs and kolkata location

acceptanceCriteria: Backend fetches prices from a reliable precious metals API that supports Kolkata location filtering
Prices are returned in Indian Rupees (INR) currency
Gold price is approximately ₹159,000 per 10 grams
Silver price is approximately ₹265,000 per kilogram

requirements.text: Set automatic price refresh interval to exactly 5 minutes (300 seconds)
acceptanceCriteria: Backend timer triggers price updates every 300 seconds
No manual refresh required from user
Timer starts automatically when canister initializes

requirements.text: Display gold price formatted as Indian Rupees per 10 grams (e.g., ₹159,000/10g)
acceptanceCriteria: Gold price displays with rupee symbol (₹)
Price is shown per 10 grams unit
Uses Indian number formatting with commas (e.g., 1,59,000)

requirements.text: Display silver price formatted as Indian Rupees per kilogram (e.g., ₹265,000/kg)
acceptanceCriteria: Silver price displays with rupee symbol (₹)
Price is shown per kilogram unit
Uses Indian number formatting with commas (e.g., 2,65,000)

requirements.text: Remove all manual refresh requirements - prices must update automatically without user interaction
acceptanceCriteria: No manual refresh button or action required
Prices update automatically in background every 5 minutes
UI reflects latest prices without page reload

constraints: Maintain 5-minute (300 second) refresh interval exactly as specified
Prices must be in Indian Rupees (INR) for Kolkata location only
Gold pricing unit must be per 10 grams
Silver pricing unit must be per kilogram
nonGoals: Support for other currencies besides INR
Support for other locations besides Kolkata
Different refresh intervals or configurable timing
